Best Fwends

By Dan & Bashie Manning

Featured: July 2025

Play or Learn More

A best buddies adventure for the Atari 2600

About the Developer

Dan is a, indie game designer and developer in Austin for over 10+ years. Bashie is an 8 year old game developer who is the World’s Biggest Sonic The Hedgehog Fan.

Games Y'all is a meetup presented by The Museum of Human Achievement. We endeavor to celebrate, amplify, and support the unique and underrepresented within indie games and beyond.
